name: Gautam Buddha Jagruti Samiti
briefDescription: Gautam Buddha Jagriti Society Has Been Estabilished 1993 And Got Formal Registration In 1996 Under Societies Registration Act 1860. The Basic Aim Of The Society Is Revive The Sustainable Cheer On Cheerless Faces By Empowering Them For Self Reliance And Resilience Capacity To Cope With The Adverse Situations. Total - 25 Members Are Working
